name: Mana
effectText: Used for various actions.  Recuperate: Spend an action to return this card to your hand from the discard pile.

name: Stab
effectText: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent enemy.  If you have advantage, deal an additional two damage.

name: Staggering Blow
effectText: Do a basic attack and move the enemy one square in any direction.

name: Trip
effectText: Target combatant loses their next turn and grants advantage to all enemies in line of sight

name: Quick Counter
effectText: Counter one attack and make a basic attack against the combatant who initiated it.

name: Knife Throw
effectText: Do a basic attack, Range 10.  Instantaneous (Doesn’t cost an action)

name: Killing Blow
effectText: Discard X number of cards. Deal X damage, multiplied by two, to an adjacent enemy.  If you have advantage against that enemy, deal X damage multiplied by three instead.

name: Quick Recovery
effectText: Take two mana from your discard pile and draw two cards.

name: Ward
effectText: Gain 10 temporary hit points until the end of your next turn.

name: Healing Salve
effectText: Every time you take a recuperate action, gain 1 HP.

name: Fireball
effectText: Deal 4 damage to all combatants in a 3x3 square area.

name: Illusory Lure
effectText: Move target enemy along a path of your choice as if they had taken a move action.

name: Shock
effectText: Deal 5 damage to target enemy.  Range 10.

name: Poison Cloud
effectText: Create a cloud of poison in a 5x5 area. Combatants who start their turn in this area take 3 damage.
